about_the_game:
This demo for Date Ariane Remastered covers the beginning and early parts of a date up to dinner. Activities after dinner will not be available in the demo program. Once the dinner is complete a short preview is shown similar to the game's trailer.

The purpose of the trailer is to show the improved graphics and what you should expect to see in the full game.
detailed_description:
This demo for Date Ariane Remastered covers the beginning and early parts of a date up to dinner. Activities after dinner will not be available in the demo program. Once the dinner is complete a short preview is shown similar to the game's trailer.

The purpose of the trailer is to show the improved graphics and what you should expect to see in the full game.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 16.04+
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 750 MB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 1280x720p

name: Date Ariane Remastered Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows Vista or higher
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Core 2 Duo
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 or DirectX 9.0c 1280x720p
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c

short_description: A short graphic demo of Date Ariane Remastered, showing the improved graphics and basic game play mechanics.
